name: Box Runner!
description:
"Box Runner! " is a 2D platform jumping game, the game is simple to operate, the atmosphere is relaxed, and the cartoon picture is suitable for casual play for a while.
【Game Operation】
The player presses the space bar to jump, and presses the space bar twice to perform a double jump.
【Game Features】
Players need to collect more gold coins to get high scores.
Players can use double jumps to navigate complex terrain.
